channel.title: Big problem with SHOPS/NPC
channel.description:
On the server that I am using atm, its an updated version of allstar scape, but anyway, i cant add any npc which you can talk to or shop, I have tried everything... nothing works, ill tell you what i have done:
In autospawn.cfg I added: [code] spawn = 2821 2613 3095 0 0 0 0 0 0 Farming Seller[/code]
In client.java I added: Undernieth "case 155: // first Click npc"
[code] } else if (NPCID == 2821) { //Farming seller PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 99;[/code]
In shops.cfg I added: [code] shop = 99 Farming Shop 1 1 5340 1000 5312 1000 5314 1000 [/code] Now it wont show the shop... when i talk with the guy Could it because shop 99 is to high? is there a limit or something? Well i tried changing the shop from 99 to 20, (removing the previous shop 20 just for testing) and it still didn't work :(((((( i removed all shops untill shop 60, still isnt working

item.title: Big problem with SHOPS/NPC
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

you need to add the wanneshop bit in client class. (i think its that file).

which makes it open up the shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Big problem with SHOPS/NPC
item.dc:creator: @johnronder johnronder
item.description:
@johnronder wrote:

On the server that I am using atm, its an updated version of allstar scape, but anyway, i cant add any npc which you can talk to or shop, I have tried everything… nothing works, ill tell you what i have done:

In autospawn.cfg I added:

spawn = 2821 2613 3095 0 0 0 0 0 0 Farming Seller

In client.java I added:
Undernieth “case 155: // first Click npc”

} else if (NPCID == 2821) { //Farming seller PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 99;

In shops.cfg I added:

shop = 99    Farming Shop        1    1    5340    1000    5312    1000    5314    1000

Now it wont show the shop… when i talk with the guy
Could it because shop 99 is to high? is there a limit or something?
Well i tried changing the shop from 99 to 20, (removing the previous shop 20 just for testing)
and it still didn’t work :((((((
i removed all shops untill shop 60, still isnt working

Read full topic
